Thanks guys for your many answers. I have a couple of questions  
regarding=
 your suggestions:

C=E9deric and Wayne: TestNG: how mature / well used is =
this compared to  
JUnit? I've been using JUnit in a few projects before an=
d see that  
lots of people use it. I've heared about TestNG before and whe=
n  
researching my ignore problems I saw it and thought that its  
differen=
t parameters for @Test looked intriguing. Does JUnit do stuff  
that TestNG=
 doesn't that I should know that I'm sacrificing should I  
switch to TestN=
G?

Continuum 1.0.3 is considered a preview release from its  
documentatio=
n and was released a year ago. This tells me that it is  
not stable and we=
ll-tried and probably hasn't a big community  
submitting bugs and coming w=
ith feature requests. This of course is  
countered by 79 commits last mont=
h. :-) What is the state of Continuum?

How do CruiseControl, Continuum and=
 Anthill compare to one-another?  
Thanks Wayne for these pointers, it all =
looks like a much better deal  
than Cron. :-)

Cheers

	Nik
